messages.title: People and Planet before Privilege
messages.content: I understand how hard it is for ordinary working people. I'm the daughter of an Ambulance Driver, I started my working life in Truro as an apprentice BT engineer. I went to a state school and now my children are attending a state school here in the constituency. I want to improve the lives of ordinary people living in this constituency. Let's fully fund our schools and NHS and free them from privatisation. Let's make sure climate catastrophe is avoided and our children have a future to look forward to.

messages.title: Only Labour Can Keep The Tories Out!
In the next election you can decide how the UK's wealth is distributed:
messages.content: Vote Tory or Lib Dem and it will keep heading to offshore tax haven bank accounts. Vote Labour and it will be invested in our infrastructure; jobs, homes, transport, schools, hospitals and clean energy.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fully fund our schools and release them from privatisation.
Fully fund the NHS and free it from privatisation.
Take actions to avoid climate catastrophe.
Ensure UK's wealth is invested in infrastructure, jobs, homes, transport, schools, hospitals, and clean energy instead of being directed to offshore bank accounts.

issues.environment: Take actions to avoid climate catastrophe. Invest in clean energy.

housing.content: Invest in homes as part of infrastructure.
